configure.p: The BooleanAccumulator actor reads a sequence of Boolean values and outputs one Boolean value from their combination.

The actor uses the logical operator ("and" or "or") specified with the logicalOperator parameter to combine the input values. If the "and" operation is selected, the output will be false if at least one input is false. If the "or" operation is selected, the output will be true if at least one input is true.

property.name: port:combination
property.configure: An output port that broadcasts a Boolean value based on the combination of the input values.

property.name: port:number
property.configure: An input port that accepts the number of Boolean values in the input sequence. The default is 1. The number may also be specified with the number parameter.

property.name: port:booleans
property.configure: An input port that accepts a sequence of Boolean values.

property.name: prop:Logical operator
property.configure: Specify either "and" or "or". The actor uses the logical operator when combining the input values. If the "and" operation is selected, the output will be false if at least one input is false. If the "or" operation is selected, the output will be true if at least one input is true.

property.name: prop:number
property.configure: The number of Boolean values in the input sequence. The default is 1. The number may be specified via the number port or parameter.
